name: Pet Obstacle Race (Game Show)
description:
This game was made for the 1st game jam I have participated in!

I thought that I could casually throw in the awareness of animal cruelty along with making the game according to the jam's theme - "Game Show". (Light non-offensive racism included. Let's see if you can find it XD [I oppose violent racism tho. Jokes are fine.])

Instead of the game show being about a human, it's about a human using an animal to win a game show. [Animal slavery]

Enjoy the gameplay experience!
